edu.clarkson.batest.ee242

Class Die

  • java.lang.Object
    • edu.clarkson.batest.ee242.Die
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    java.lang.Comparable<Die>
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    LoadedDie

    public class Die
extends java.lang.Object
implements java.lang.Comparable<Die>
    Created to represent any sided die This die can be rolled, looked at, and compared with another die
    Author:
    Troy

      protected int numberOfSides 
      protected static java.util.Random rand

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      int compareTo(Die other)
      Compares the top number to another die and returns if it is greater, less than, or equal
      (package private) boolean equals(Die other)
      This class takes in an different die class this then returns true if the number of sides are equal and the number on top is the same.
      (package private) int getTop()
      getTop returns the value on the top of the Die without rolling it again.
      int hashCode()
      Overrides hashCode in order to return a value based on the topNumber and number of sides
      (package private) int roll()
      The roll function returns a random variable between 1 and 6.
      java.lang.String toString()
      Overrides the toString method to return the number of sides and the number on top

    • Method Detail

      • roll

        int roll()
        The roll function returns a random variable between 1 and 6. This represents the value that would be displayed on the top of the die.
        Returns:
        the integer rolled

      • getTop

        int getTop()
        getTop returns the value on the top of the Die without rolling it again.
        Returns:
        the number on the die
